Text: @ QuadCore, oh give it a rest, how many times have you said that now? You obviously never read my replies or pay any attenton whatsoever. AGAIN, I used to always put them under "Video > TV Shows" and they always got changed by TPB to highres, so I quit bothering. Then after enough of your constant whining I started putting them under "Video > TV Shows" again and you know what.....they got switched AGAIN! Sheeeeesh.
